translation: When a person is not attached to the sense-objects or to actions, having renounced all thoughts, then they are said to have attained Yoga.
commentary: 6.4 When when? Hi verily? Not not? in senseobjects? Not not? Karmasu in actions? anushajjate is attached? Sarvasankalpasannyasi renouncer of all thoughts? Yogarudhah one who has attained to Yoga? Then then? Ucyate is said.Commentary Yogarudha he who is enthroned or established in Yoga. When a Yogi? by keeping the mind ite steady? by withdrawing it from the objects of the senses? has attachment neither
